archimate:BusinessObject.name: VPNSecurityServiceSpecRole
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This class defines the specific type of security that is required to implement a particular CustomerFacingVPNService in terms of ResourceFacingServiceSpecRoles. Thus, it represents all of the invariant characteristics necessary to build a VPNSecurityService, abstracted in terms of ServiceSpecificationRoles.
Please see the DEN-ng MPLS VPN model for more details.
